00021     public function SpriteFrame($width,$height,$decoded=false) {
00022         if($width == 0) {
00023             throw new Exception('Zero width');
00024         } else if($height == 0) {
00025             throw new Exception('Zero height');
00026         }
00027         $this->width = $width;
00028         $this->height = $height;
00029         $this->decoded = $decoded;
00030     }
00031 
00032     protected function HasBeenDecoded() {
00033         return $this->decoded;  
00034     }

00044         $this->EnsureDecoded();
00045         return $this->gdImage;
00046     }

00050         return $this->width;

00072     public function GetPixel($x,$y) {
00073         $this->EnsureDecoded();
00074         $colori = imagecolorat($this->gdImage, $x, $y);
00075         $color = imagecolorsforindex($this->gdImage, $colori);
00076         return $color;
00077     }

00087     public function SetPixel($x,$y,$r,$g,$b) {
00088         $this->EnsureDecoded();
00089         imagesetpixel($this->gdImage, $x, $y, imagecolorallocate($this->gdImage, $r, $g, $b));
00090     }

00099     protected function EnsureDecoded() {
00100         if(!$this->decoded)
00101             $this->Decode();
00102 
00103         $this->decoded = true;
00104     }

00130     public function ToSpriteFrame($type) {
00131         $this->EnsureDecoded();
00132         if(substr(get_class($this),0,3) == $type && substr(get_class($this),3) == 'Frame') {
00133             return $this;
00134         }
00135         switch($type) {
00136         case 'C16':
00137             return new C16Frame($this->GetGDImage());
00138         case 'S16':
00139             return new S16Frame($this->GetGDImage());
00140         case 'SPR':
00141             return new SPRFrame($this->GetGDImage());
00142         default:
00143             throw new Exception('Invalid sprite type '.$type.'.');
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00148 
00151     public function ToPNG() {
00152         $this->EnsureDecoded();
00153         ob_start();
00154         imagepng($this->GetGDImage());
00155         $data = ob_get_contents();
00156         ob_end_clean();
00157         return $data;
00158     }
